comment: It’s absolutely disgusting that this woman plays an activist and she’s actually the abuser. The ACLU should have removed her YEARS AGO!!
commentable_entity.ask: Take away the charitable status of the ACLU
commentable_entity.title: Take away the charitable status of the ACLU
commentable_entity.description:
Sign the petition to take away the charitable status of the ACLU for being part of the hoax conducted by their ambassador Amber Heard.

The ACLU helped Amber conduct her hoax by naming her an ambassador and by helping written the Op-Ed which only target was to monetize and destroy the life and careed of her victim.

The ACLU has stood by an abuser, the same abuser that pledge 3.5 million from her short and  toxic marriage with Johnny Depp and which she hasn't fulfilled.

Amber Heard has been exposed and along with her many thirsts parties including the ACLU. 

We can not allow institutions to protect domestic violence perpetrators regardless of their gender. 

Many have hidden behind the shield of feminism however feminism fights for equality not for women supremacy where they are allowed commit crimes and get away with them just for being women.
commentable_entity.letter_body: Take away the charitable status of the ACLU
commentable_entity.display_title: Take away the charitable status of the ACLU
commentable_entity.petition_title: Take away the charitable status of the ACLU
